text: Lou Leabengula Myers (September 26, 1935 - February 19, 2013) was an American actor. He was known for his role as Vernon Gaines in A Different World. Myers was born in Chesapeake, West Virginia on September 26, 1935. Myers died on February 19, 2013 in Charleston, West Virginia from pneumonia and heart failure, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Interview with Lou Myers at mosaec.com Category:1935 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from West Virginia Category:African-American actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: Lou Myers
